Action.author: bgorman
Action.body: ~juliancarrivick and I were encountering this yesterday when trying the SDK. We noted that the missing files might be the ones found under {{fabric/sdk/node/node_modules/elliptic/node_modules/hash.js}} but we couldn't seem to get it working. Perhaps it's just a search path issue?

Action.author: juliancarrivick
Action.body: ~keithsmith on Slack thought it might be because there were some files that were missed in the migration from Gerrit.

Action.author: bgorman
Action.body: Kevin may be on to something. There is definitely a lib/hash.js in the GitHub code: https://github.com/hyperledger/fabric/blob/master/sdk/node/lib/hash.js

Action.author: bgorman
Action.body: Just found the slack conversation. ~hgabre has a changeset here: https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/455/

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: Please do not merge that yet...

Action.author: jonathanlevi
Action.body: We ( ~hgabre and I) are on this... thanks.

Action.author: jonathanlevi
Action.body: ~angrbrd Thank you vm for all your help here on Friday!

Action.author: angrbrd
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu Can this issue be closed per my change set above? Thanks!

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: I think it could, yes. The build seems to be healthy. ~rameshthoomu ?

Action.author: jimthematrix@gmail.com
Action.body: ~rameshthoomu has the patch been integrated so we can close the issue? thanks!

Action.author: christopherferris
Action.body: It would really help if we tracked commits with issues. https://gerrit.hyperledger.org/r/#/c/673/
